Parameters: int: The total number of packages being processed in this restore operation.
int: Zero on success; a nonzero error code if the restore operation as a whole failed.
restoreFinished(int).Description: The restore process has completed. This method will always be called, even if no individual package restore operations were attempted.

Parameters: int: The index, between 1 and the numPackages parameter to the @B_android#app#backup#RestoreObserver#restoreStarting_E@ callback, of the package now being restored. This may be non-monotonic; it is intended purely as a rough indication of the backup manager's progress through the overall restore process.
String: The name of the package now being restored.
onUpdate(int,java.lang.String).Description: An indication of which package is being restored currently, out of the total number provided in the @B_android#app#backup#RestoreObserver#restoreStarting_E@ callback. This method is not guaranteed to be called: if the transport is unable to obtain data for one or more of the requested packages, no onUpdate() call will occur for those packages.
onUpdate(int,java.lang.String).FullName: public void onUpdate (int nowBeingRestored, String currentPackage)

Parameters: int: The index, between 1 and the numPackages parameter to the @B_android#app#backup#RestoreObserver#restoreStarting_E@ callback, of the package now being restored. This may be non-monotonic; it is intended purely as a rough indication of the backup manager's progress through the overall restore process.
String: The name of the package now being restored.
onUpdate(int, java.lang.String).Description: An indication of which package is being restored currently, out of the total number provided in the @B_android#app#backup#RestoreObserver#restoreStarting_E@ callback. This method is not guaranteed to be called: if the transport is unable to obtain data for one or more of the requested packages, no onUpdate() call will occur for those packages.
onUpdate(int, java.lang.String).FullName: public void onUpdate (int nowBeingRestored, String currentPackage)

ClassDesc: Callback class for receiving progress reports during a restore operation. These methods will all be called on your application's main thread.
